p: Antifungal activities (Minimum inhibitory concentrations; MICs) of the isolated metabolite 170 were determined using a serial dilution assay against Mucor hiemalis DSM 2656. Compound 170 showed moderate to weak antifungal activity against Mucor hiemalis DSM 2656 with a MIC value of 33.33 Î¼g/mL [ 52].
